text: @realDonaldTrump Getting lucky because the efforts of so many others worked to make it so, isn’t the same thing as having a plan and being prepared. Get your shit together! #Leadership #COVID19 #CommonSense @WhiteHouse @GOP @SenateGOP @CDCgov @US_FDA #transparency https://t.co/okIO5XR3s5
